subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Udaipur?
question_hi: उदयपुर में कौन श्रीलंका मुख्यमंत्री के विश्वासपुर का मतलब है।
explanation_en: Kumbhalgarh Fort is a famous fort located in Rajasthan. It is known for its massive walls and historical significance.

explanation_en: Meena Fort is located in Meena, Rajasthan. Rajasthan ma Meena ke liye Meena Fort banaye hai.
explanation_hi: मेशंग संगरेसंगरेसी मं फ़मं भाली (मं फ़मेशंगरेसी)
question_en: The Meena Fort is a famous fort in Rajasthan. Which fort is famous in Rajasthan?
